projects.title: Flight Data Monitoring System
projects.bodyText: Front-End Developer (Flight Data Monitoring System): Key contributions include leading a skilled software engineering team, spearheading React/Vue front-end development, collaborating on Java SpringBoot back-end, managing PostgreSQL and Sequelize tasks, and deploying the system on AWS. Demonstrated expertise in React, Redux, and cross-functional collaboration. Contributed to a cutting-edge solution for enhanced flight safety.
